title: Redirections
description: Web redirections configured for this domain.
emptyHint: Add a redirection to redirect visitors to another URL.
notSupportedDesc: Web redirections are not available because your DNS servers are external (not hosted at OVH). To use this feature, configure OVH DNS servers in the DNS Servers tab.
notSupportedApiDesc: Web redirections are not enabled for this domain. This feature may not be available depending on your offer or your DNS zone configuration.
errorInvalidUrl: URL must start with http:// or https://
confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this redirection?
infoDesc: Permanent redirections (301) are recommended for SEO. Invisible redirections use an iframe.
